# seaweedfs_iam_access_key (Resource)

Manages a SeaweedFS IAM access key for a user.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `user_name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `access_key_id` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `secret_access_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `status` (String)
